channel.title: Npc Twitch [Help Plz...]
channel.description:
Hey, When i use my command ::npc
Or i use when click on object (like barrows) server.npcHandler.spawnANPC2
After 5 mins. All my npc's are buging... the twitch.... I download a few sources....(Delta) they do i to! I download Boxing Scape(Delta) and they are not twitching..... So i copied.... npc.java - npchandeler.java to my server.... Get a few bug's and fix them... now i compiled... no errors... Tried again with my server.... THEY TWITCH!!!!!!
I cant find the problem... now 14 hours later nothing..... I tried every thing client.java - server.java NOTHING...
Plz Can Some One Help Me?

item.title: Npc Twitch [Help Plz...]
item.dc:creator: @GayForumStaff GayForumStaff
item.description:
@GayForumStaff wrote:

I will throw an idea out there!!!

Walking type in autospawn? Change it so they dont move?
It may be trying to walk in a 0 x 0 space.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Twitch [Help Plz...]
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

I am really not sure what the problem could be, i think you should just get a new source, or actualy it might be the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Twitch [Help Plz...]
